faq.title: Everything you need to know about Trustora

items.question: What is Trustora and how does it work?
items.answer: Trustora is a Romanian platform that connects clients with vetted IT experts. You can search services, compare offers, and collaborate directly through our secure platform.

items.question: Is Trustora free to use?
items.answer: Yes, signing up and browsing services are completely free. You only pay for the services you order, with no hidden fees.

items.question: How are experts verified on the platform?
items.answer: All providers go through a rigorous verification process including identity, portfolio, references, and technical skills validation.

items.question: How quickly will I receive offers for my project?
items.answer: Typically, you'll receive your first offers within a few hours after publishing. Most clients get 3-5 offers on the first day.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer, and PayPal. All transactions are secured via SSL.

items.question: When is the provider paid?
items.answer: Payment is released in milestones set in the contract. Funds are released only after you confirm each stage is completed satisfactorily.

items.question: Can I receive an invoice for ordered services?
items.answer: Yes. All providers registered as sole proprietors or companies can issue invoices. Specify this requirement when posting your project.

items.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the result?
items.answer: We offer client protection. If the service doesn't meet specifications, you can request free revisions or a refund.

items.question: How do I post a new project?
items.answer: Click "Post Project", fill in the details (description, budget, deadline), and publish. You'll receive offers from interested experts within hours.

items.question: Can I modify a project after publishing it?
items.answer: Yes, you can edit the description, budget, and other details until you accept an offer. After that, changes require agreement from both parties.

items.question: How do I communicate with providers?
items.answer: All communication happens through the platform's built-in messaging system, which keeps a history of conversations and shared files.

items.question: Can I work with the same provider on multiple projects?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can directly invite providers you've worked with before to new projects without posting publicly.

items.question: How secure is my data on the platform?
items.answer: We use bank-level SSL encryption and comply with GDPR. Your data is stored securely and not shared with third parties without your consent.

items.question: How do I protect the intellectual property of my project?
items.answer: We recommend signing an NDA before sharing sensitive details. We provide free templates.

items.question: What should I do if I suspect fraudulent activity?
items.answer: Report it immediately via our reporting system. We investigate all cases within 24 hours and take appropriate action.
